name: Mega Bubble Pop
description:
Join the bubble popping MEGA FUN and enjoy an addictive game filled with awesome levels, puzzles, challenges, and adventures.
Download and PLAY Mega Bubble Pop, match colors and pop all the bubbles to get points and finish levels.
It’s so easy to pick up and play!

-- Mega Bubble Popping Fun!
Tap on the screen to drag the laser aim and lift it to smash bubbles.
Your goal is to shoot and pop all the bubbles until you clear the board.
Match at least 3 bubbles of the same color to blast them away and win levels.
Boost your experience with awesome power-ups
Reach high scores and try to earn 3 stars on every level.

-- Exciting Game Features!
Play over 1000 levels filled with fun puzzles.
Completely free to play.
Free bubble swap.
Powerful boosts to help you pass levels.
Play online, or offline-no internet connection is required!


Get it now from the play store and experience easy and fun gameplay, tap on the screen to shoot bubbles, make powerful combinations and plan your moves to finish levels!
